A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The problem with this Movie is that they picked up so many story parts but left them unfinished. They only showed really small aprts of Rey and Luke's \"training\"\, the whole casino on canto bight didn't felt \"Star Wars-like\" and there were so many unnecessary slapstick-moments and jokes in it (Poe talking about Hux'es mother). All in all\, they just wanted too much in one film and lost focus on the storytelling and the character-development.
